articles.author: Howard Schneider
articles.title: Fed in holding pattern as inflation delays approach to soft landing - Reuters
articles.description: Inflation showing no recent sign of slowing or narrowing in scope leaves U.S. Federal Reserve policymakers challenged this week over how to characterize their next steps even as the countdown to a contentious U.S. presidential election continues.
